MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G33 area of Glasgow, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:20am. Our engineers have arrived onsite. And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30 AM on Monday, 15 March 2021.
